subject_information.address: 230 Tiffany Mountain Suite 863, South Michael, KY 25205

suspicious_activity.narrative: Customer CUST_0062, an operational investment banker, received $98,090.16 via wire transfer on 2025-07-27. Unidirectional fund flow and high-value transfers totaling $380,633.78 between 2025-02-03 and 2025-08-01 raise suspicion of money laundering. Activity aligns with layering and fund movement schemes, warranting a SAR filing under 31 CFR 1020.320 (BSA) and FinCEN SAR Instructions.
suspicious_activity.ai_reasoning:

            # Step 2 - Pattern Recognition:

            # Step 3 - Regulatory Mapping:
            # Applicable Regulations: 31 CFR 1010.320

            # Step 4 - Risk Quantification:
            # Risk Score: 85/100
            # Likelihood of Illicit Intent: High

            Step 5 - Classification Decision:
            The consistent high-value wire transfers and one-way flow of funds align with typical money laundering schemes involving layering and fund movement.
